title: Broker Employers List
description: List of employers who are clients of a given broker

broker_agency.description: Legal name of broker agency organization

broker_clients.title: Broker clients array schema.
broker_clients.description: the list of employer clients of a broker

items.title: roker clients array eleemnt schema.
items.description: An employer client of a broker

employer_name.title: Employer_name schema.
employer_name.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

open_enrollment_begins.title: Open_enrollment_begins schema.
open_enrollment_begins.description: The date (MM/DD/YYYY) on which this employer's next open enrollment begins

open_enrollment_ends.title: Open_enrollment_ends schema.
open_enrollment_ends.description: The date (MM/DD/YYYY) on which this employer's next open enrollment ends

plan_year_begins.title: Plan_year_begins schema.
plan_year_begins.description: The date (MM/DD/YYYY) on which this employer's next coverage plan year begins

renewal_in_progress.title: Renewal_in_progress schema.
renewal_in_progress.description: Boolean value(true/false) showing whether the employer is currently in a renewal process.

renewal_application_available.title: Renewal_application_available schema.
renewal_application_available.description: The date (MM/DD/YYYY) on which this employer's next coverage plan year renewal period begins

renewal_application_due.title: Renewal_application_due schema.
renewal_application_due.description: The date (MM/DD/YYYY) of the deadline for this employer's next renewal application.

binder_payment_due.title: Binder_payment_due schema.
binder_payment_due.description: The date (MM/DD/YYYY) on which this employer's next binder payment, if any, is due, or null.

employees_total.title: Employees_total schema.
employees_total.description: The total number of employees on this employer's roster

employees_enrolled.title: Employees_enrolled schema.
employees_enrolled.description: The total number of employees on this employer's roster who have enrolled in an HBX plan offered by the employer.

employees_waived.title: Employees_waived schema.
employees_waived.description: The total number of employees on this employer's roster who have waived coverage through this employer

minimum_participation_required.title: Minimum_participation_required schema.
minimum_participation_required.description: The total number of employees who must be enrolled or waived in order for this employer to meet the minimum participation requirement.

estimated_premium.title: Estimated premium schema.
estimated_premium.description: Information on the employer's current monthly premium.

employee_contribution.title: Employee_contribution schema.
employee_contribution.description: The portion of the current monthly total premium paid by employees.

employer_contribution.title: Employer_contribution schema.
employer_contribution.description: The portion of the current monthly total premium paid by the employer

phone.title: Phone schema.
phone.description: Phone number of the employer's point of contact.

address_1.title: Address_1 schema.
address_1.description: First line of employer contact address.

address_2.title: Address_2 schema.
address_2.description: Second line of employer contact address.

state.title: State schema.
state.description: Two-letter state code of employer contact address.

zip.title: Zip schema.
zip.description: Five-digit zip code of employer contact address
